document.body:
Your cart is currently empty. Track Order
Bakery Equipment Bar Concession Cooking Equipment Dining Room, Display, Service Food Preparation Fryers Furnishings Ice Machines Janitorial, Cleaning, Maintenance Kitchenware Parts Refrigeration Serving&Display Tabletop Transport&Storage Warewashing Address: 14910 Aurora Ave. North Shoreline, WA 98133 Hours: Mon. - Fri. 9am to 6pm Sat. - 10am to 5pm Sun. - Closed Phone (Greater-Seattle Area): 206-362-4900 Toll Free: 800-343-6890 Fax: 206-362-4902 E-mail our Sales Dept: sales@srscooks.com WELCOME TO THE SEATTLE RESTAURANT STORE ONLINE! We are Seattle’s oldest commercial restaurant equipment supplier. Our family owned and operated company has been providing equipment, fixtures, and furnishings to Northwest taverns, restaurants, hotels, and homes since 1933.
CULINARY STUDENTS! HEADING BACK TO SCHOOL? We offer a wide range of quality blades to get you started out right. See our cutlery section for more information on our great selection of cutlery.
Kai - Shun Wüsthof Forschner Kyocera
We are open to the public! Please browse our website for the best deals on restaurant equipment and culinaria on the web. If you have the inclination to browse our 20,000 square-foot showroom, please stop by and mention that you saw us on the web. Thank you for visiting us!
